jld.title: Go Pro & Get CLE Webinar Access
description: When you upgrade to Justia Connect Pro, you unlock access to exclusive Justia Webinars with CLE credit available for select live and on-demand programs. This is one of the many benefits of Justia Connect Pro. Expand your visibility with the eye-catching Justia Connect Pro Badge, get $200 credit applicable toward select Justia Marketing Solutions, and select featured reviews on your profile -- all of this is included in Justia Connect Pro!
